issue.title: [CF 22] GetItemCooldown()
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Enter item name Medallion of the Horde (http://www.wowhead.com/item=51378)
2. Enable icon
3. Icon type > Cooldown
4. Show item when > Always
5. Show Timer
6. Shortly thereafter, I got an errors popped up in Swatter:
TellMeWhen.lua line 940:
Usage: GetItemCooldown(itemID)

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
I expected the button to show me the cooldown remaining on my trinket. Instead it just showed the item, but never showed cooldown going down after using it.

What version of the product are you using?
1.3.1

Do you have an error log of what happened?

Please provide any additional information below.


> Posted by CurseForge user zhartley | Imported from CurseForge issue #22 | Raw

comments.body:
Use a version that isn't extremely old, please.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Sorry, I didn't realize the 2 week old version was "extremely old". I'll update and check and see if the error goes away.


> Posted by CurseForge user zhartley

Yep, it had been fixed. Sorry I didn't update before making a ticket. I had been using the version 1.3.1 with no apparent problems until this so I didn't even think to try updating it to fix it.


> Posted by CurseForge user zhartley
